meanings.definition: A person who drives a cart.
meanings.sent1: The carters delivered goods to the market.
meanings.sent2: The carters loaded up the cart with fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: The carters raced each other to see who could deliver first.
meanings.sent4: The carters navigated the narrow streets with skill and precision.
meanings.sent5: The carters were known for their reliable and efficient service.

meanings.sent1: The carters were a group of hardworking individuals.
meanings.sent2: The carters gathered at the depot before starting their routes.
meanings.sent3: The carters celebrated their successful deliveries with a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The carters' unity was as strong as the wheels on their carts.
meanings.sent5: The carters' teamwork ensured timely deliveries to all customers.
